title: Trolls & Odyssey Onslaught Missions
body:
I really love how the community doesn't argue about the missions, and then doesn't troll when the team settle on a mission to do... Amazing job making the missions so stupidly hard to do in a random queue. 
Please next time can you implement actual queues for missions that have such specific requirements, creating such troll incidents. I've spent too many hours trying to find a random team that actually agrees on a queue... and that makes me not even want to play this game at all in the end.
It's a recurring discussion amongst others, not just me.
 ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
